findings.title: Owner can update max wallet amount
findings.description: The owner has the capability to update the maximum wallet amount.

findings.title: Owner can update max transaction amount
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to update the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can update total fees not greater than 30%
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to update total fees up to a maximum of 30%.

findings.title: Owner can renounce ownership
findings.description: The contract owner has the capability to renounce ownership, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can transfer ownership
findings.description: The owner has the capability to transfer ownership of the contract.

findings.title: Owner can update pancake pair address
findings.description: The contract owner has the capability to update the Pancake pair address.

findings.title: Owner can update pancake router address
findings.description: The owner has the capability to update the Pancake Router address.

findings.title: Owner can change liquidity pool wallet address
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to modify the liquidity pool wallet address, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change marketing wallet address
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to update the marketing wallet address, which could potentially lead to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum amount to take fee greater than 0
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to modify the minimum amount required to take a fee greater than 0, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change and toggle automated market maker pair address
findings.description: The owner has the ability to modify and toggle the automated market maker pair address, which could potentially lead to unauthorized changes or disruptions to the system.

findings.title: Owner can exclude/include addresses from fees
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to exclude or include specific addresses from fees, which could lead to unintended behavior or potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude/include addresses from max transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the capability to include or exclude specific addresses from the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint an unlimited number of tokens before initial deployment, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade (implied by the existence of renounce ownership and transfer ownership functions)
findings.description: The contract has renounce ownership and transfer ownership functions which can potentially lead to unauthorized script upgrades.
